contest-event.event-date: Oct. 2, 1880 D Intercolonial Band Contest Intercolonial Band Contest 0 Other Intercolonial Band Contest intercolonial-band-contest Although an earlier contest in Sydney in 1880 had borne the same title, the Band Association of NSW ran its inaugural "Intercolonial Band Contest" in 1896. The second event, in 1897, was advertised as for the "Championship of Australasia", and is considered to be the first in the sequence of Australian national championships (noting that the federation of Australia did not occur until 1901). Own Choice Test Piece Contest Exhibition Building, Prince Alfred Park, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia Contest took place over three days. Sat 2nd October, Monday 4th October and the final day and prize-giving on 23rd October. This latter was in the Theatre Royal, Sydney.
